creator: derbeth.fora@wp.pl
text:
Compare the bin/ directory in apache-tomcat-7.0.22.tar.gz and .zip available from http://tomcat.apache.org/download-70.cgi.

The ZIP file contains .bat scripts as well as .sh scripts while .tar.gz contains only .bat scripts.

Please add .sh files with correct file permissions to .tar.gz archive.

The bug exists at least since Tomcat 7.0.10.

creator: knst.kolinko@gmail.com
text:
Cannot confirm this.
The sh files are present in apache-tomcat-7.0.22.tar.gz
Mode -rwxr-xr-x

Maybe you failed to unpack the archive?
